SELECT 'N' as CHECK_BOX , MR.ROUTING_ID , MR.ROUTING_NM , MR.ROUTING_SHORT_NM , MRP.OPERATION_SEQ , MRP.OPERATION_ID , MO.OPERATION_NM , MRP.FINAL_OPERATION_YN , MO.INSPECTION_YN , MRP.MILESTONE , MR.COMPANY_CD , MR.DIVISION_CD , TO_CHAR(ROWNUM) AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_ROUTING MR , MOM_ROUTING_PATH MRP , MOM_OPERATION MO WHERE MR.COMPANY_CD = MRP.COMPANY_CD AND MR.DIVISION_CD = MRP.DIVISION_CD AND MR.ROUTING_ID = MRP.ROUTING_ID AND MRP.COMPANY_CD = MO.COMPANY_CD AND MRP.DIVISION_CD = MO.DIVISION_CD AND MRP.OPERATION_ID = MO.OPERATION_ID AND MR.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MR.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (UPPER(MR.ROUTING_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{routingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MR.ROUTING_SHORT_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{routingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MR.ROUTING_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{routingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MRP.OPERATION_ID IN ( SELECT MRP.OPERATION_ID FROM MOM_ROUTING_PATH MRP WHERE MRP.COMPANY_CD = MR.COMPANY_CD AND MRP.DIVISION_CD = MR.DIVISION_CD AND MRP.ROUTING_ID = MR.ROUTING_ID AND UPPER(MRP.OPERATION_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{operationId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MR.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MRP.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MO.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MR.ROUTING_ID , MRP.OPERATION_SEQ
